heading: Software Developer Intern
description: Working as a Software Developer Intern, contributing to real-world projects while gaining hands-on experience in full-stack development, API integration, and modern web technologies.
keyResponsibilities: Collaborating with the development team to build and improve web application features.
Writing clean, maintainable code and assisting in debugging and issue resolution.
Integrating APIs and optimizing application workflows for better performance.
Participating in team meetings, sprint planning, and code reviews to ensure high-quality deliverables.
